cities.pilotSpots: Cities and pilot sites using DengueChat+

data.analyzeAndMeasure: Organize, analyze, and measure your community's progress in reducing Aedes mosquitoes, the vectors of Dengue, Zika, and Chikungunya viruses
data.versatileTools: Versatile tools to analyze the spread or containment of Dengue, Zika, and Chikungunya vectors
data.generateReports: At the community or city level, generate reports to motivate leaders

register.joinCommunity: Join your community and fight against the Aedes aegypti mosquito.
